question_description: On the Conference Report: H.R. 2863 Conference Report; A bill making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2006, and for other purposes.
On the Concurrent Resolution: S. Con. Res. 74; A concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment of H.R. 2863.
